original_text: And if the leprous disease breaks out in the skin, so that the leprous disease covers all the skin of the diseased person from head to foot, so far as the priest can see,
korean_text: 제사장이 보기에 나병이 그 피부에 크게 발생하였으되 그 환자의 머리부터 발끝까지 퍼졌으면

sentences.original_text: And if the leprous disease breaks out in the skin,
so that the leprous disease covers all the skin of the diseased person,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 나병이 그 병자의 모든 피부를 덮고,

sentences.original_text: so far as the priest can see,
